history.proof: intros b b0 b1 H. unfold leb in *. destruct b, b0, b1. - reflexivity. - inversion H. - reflexivity. - reflexivity. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b || b0) (b || b1)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
leb = fun b0 b1 : bool => if b0 then if b1 then True else False else if b1 then True else True : bool -> bool -> Prop Argument scopes are [bool_scope bool_scope]
andb_inc_r : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b && b0) (b && b1)
andb_inc_l : forall b b0 b1 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb (b0 && b) (b1 && b)
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
ssrbool.orbA = fun __top_assumption_ : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => forall y z : bool, b || (y || z) = b || y || z) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => forall y z : bool, b || (y || z) = b || y || z) false) => if __top_assumption_ as b return ((fun b0 : bool => forall y z : bool, b0 || (y || z) = b0 || y || z) b) then _evar_0_ else _evar_0_0) (fun __top_assumption_0 : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => forall z : bool, true || (b || z) = true || b || z) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => forall z : bool, true || (b || z) = true || b || z) false) => if __top_assumption_0 as b return ((fun b0 : bool =>...
ssrbool.andb_orl = fun __top_assumption_ : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => forall y z : bool, (b || y) && z = b && z || y && z) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => forall y z : bool, (b || y) && z = b && z || y && z) false) => if __top_assumption_ as b return ((fun b0 : bool => forall y z : bool, (b0 || y) && z = b0 && z || y && z) b) then _evar_0_ else _evar_0_0) (fun __top_assumption_0 : bool => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun b : bool => forall z : bool, (true || b) && z = true && z || b && z) true) (_evar_0_0 : (fun b : bool => forall z : bool, (true || b) && z = true && z || b && z) false) => if __top_assumption_...
leb_transitive : forall a b c : bool, leb a b -> leb b c -> leb a c
leb_antisymmetric : forall b c : bool, leb b c -> leb c b -> b = c
ssrbool.orbT : forall b : bool, is_true (b || true)
Nat.add3_bits_div2 : forall a0 b0 c0 : bool, (Nat.b2n a0 + Nat.b2n b0 + Nat.b2n c0) / 2 = Nat.b2n (a0 && b0 || c0 && (a0 || b0))
N.add3_bits_div2 : forall a0 b0 c0 : bool, ((N.b2n a0 + N.b2n b0 + N.b2n c0) / 2)%N = N.b2n (a0 && b0 || c0 && (a0 || b0))
leb_reflexive : forall b : bool, leb b b
ssrbool.orKb : forall a b : bool, a && (b || a) = a
orb_comm : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = b2 || b1
orb_assoc : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, b1 || (b2 || b3) = b1 || b2 || b3
absorption_orb : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b1 && b2 = b1
BinInt.Z.add3_bits_div2 : forall a0 b0 c0 : bool, BinInt.Z.div (BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.b2z a0) (BinInt.Z.b2z b0)) (BinInt.Z.b2z c0)) (Zpos 2) = BinInt.Z.b2z (a0 && b0 || c0 && (a0 || b0))
andb_orb_distrib_r : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, b1 && (b2 || b3) = b1 && b2 || b1 && b3
absorption_andb : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 && (b1 || b2) = b1
orb_andb_distrib_r : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, b1 || b2 && b3 = (b1 || b2) && (b1 || b3)
orb_andb_distrib_l : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, b1 && b2 || b3 = (b1 || b3) && (b2 || b3)
orb_false_intro : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = false -> b2 = false -> b1 || b2 = false
orb_true_intro : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true \/ b2 = true -> b1 || b2 = true
orb_false_elim : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = false -> b1 = false /\ b2 = false
orb_false_iff : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = false < -> b1 = false /\ b2 = false
orb_true_iff : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = true < -> b1 = true \/ b2 = true
andb_orb_distrib_l : forall b1 b2 b3 : bool, (b1 || b2) && b3 = b1 && b3 || b2 && b3
negb_andb : forall b1 b2 : bool, negb (b1 && b2) = negb b1 || negb b2
negb_orb : forall b1 b2 : bool, negb (b1 || b2) = negb b1 && negb b2
Reflect.orE : forall b1 b2 : bool, is_true (b1 || b2) < -> is_true b1 \/ is_true b2
BinIntDef.Z.lor = fun a b : Z => match a with | Z0 => b | Zpos a0 => match b with | Z0 => a | Zpos b0 => Zpos (Pos.lor a0 b0) | Zneg b0 => Zneg (N.succ_pos (N.ldiff (Pos.pred_N b0) (N.pos a0))) end | Zneg a0 => match b with | Z0 => a | Zpos b0 => Zneg (N.succ_pos (N.ldiff (Pos.pred_N a0) (N.pos b0))) | Zneg b0 => Zneg (N.succ_pos (N.land (Pos.pred_N a0) (Pos.pred_N b0))) end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
orb_true_elim : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = true -> {b1 = true} + {b2 = true}
ssrbool.introT : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), reflect P b -> P -> is_true b
ssrbool.elimTF : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), reflect P b -> b = c -> if c then P else ~ P
ssrbool.norP = fun b1 b2 : bool => if b1 as b return (reflect (is_true (negb b) /\ is_true (negb b2)) (negb (b || b2))) then if b2 as b return (reflect (is_true (negb true) /\ is_true (negb b)) (negb (true || b))) then ReflectF (is_true (negb true) /\ is_true (negb true)) (fun __top_assumption_ : is_true (negb true) /\ is_true (negb true) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall a b : is_true (negb true), (fun _ : is_true (negb true) /\ is_true (negb true) => False) (conj a b) => match __top_assumption_ as a return ((fun _ : is_true (negb true) /\ is_true (negb true) => False) a) with | conj x x0 => _evar_0_ x x0 end) (fun _ b : is_true (negb true) => ssrbool.not_false_is_true b))...
N.div_unique : forall a b q r : N, (r < b)%N -> a = (b * q + r)%N -> q = (a / b)%N
orb_diag : forall b : bool, b || b = b
ssrbool.orP = fun b1 b2 : bool => if b1 as b return (reflect (is_true b \/ is_true b2) (b || b2)) then if b2 as b return (reflect (is_true true \/ is_true b) (true || b)) then ReflectT (is_true true \/ is_true true) (or_intror ssrbool.is_true_true) else ReflectT (is_true true \/ is_true false) (or_introl ssrbool.is_true_true) else if b2 as b return (reflect (is_true false \/ is_true b) (false || b)) then ReflectT (is_true false \/ is_true true) (or_intror ssrbool.is_true_true) else ReflectF (is_true false \/ is_true false) (fun __top_assumption_ : is_true false \/ is_true false => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall a : is_true false, (fun _ : is_true false \/ is_true false => False) (or_introl a)) (_evar_0_0 : forall b : is_true false, (fun _ : is_true false \/ is_true false => False)...
orb_false_r : forall b : bool, b || false = b
orb_false_l : forall b : bool, false || b = b
ssrbool.orbN : forall b : bool, b || negb b = true

```intros b b0 b1 H. unfold leb in *. destruct b, b0, b1.
- reflexivity.
- inversion H.
- reflexivity.
- reflexivity.```
